Title: Postmortem Of Love 2
Writer: Luv Ranjan (story), Rahul Mody (screenplay and dialogue), Tarun Jain (screenplay and dialogue), Luv Ranjan (screenplay and dialogue)
Actors: Kartik Aaryan, Omkar Kapoor, Sunny Singh Nijjar, Nushrat Bharucha
Plot: After falling in love, three roommates experience changes in their lives.
